code:
-spec can_split_array(Nums :: [integer()], M :: integer()) -> boolean().
can_split_array(Nums, M) ->
    % Calculate the total sum of the array.
    TotalSum = lists:sum(Nums),
    % Find the smallest element in the array.
    MinElement = lists:min(Nums),
    % The length of the nums list.
    LengthNums = length(Nums),
    % Check if the total sum minus the smallest element is still greater than or equal to M,
    % which is a simplified heuristic to check if we have enough "value" to split the array
    % satisfying the condition for sums. This also inherently checks if splitting into individual
    % elements (where each element is a subarray) is possible, as required for n non-empty arrays.
    (TotalSum - MinElement >= M * (LengthNums - 1)) andalso TotalSum >= M.
